title: theBalancedBriefNLbreakingNews
description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLbreakingNews, skipping any feeds with errors.

items.title: Bit by bit, small US groups chip away at historic levels of social isolation
items.description: Americans are disconnected from each other at historic levels, buffeted by what a former surgeon general calls an “epidemic of loneliness.”

items.title: Five new defendants have been charged in connection with a Minnesota housing services fraud scheme
